00006 #ifndef ITERATOR_TRAITS_DWA200347_HPP
00007 # define ITERATOR_TRAITS_DWA200347_HPP
00008 
00009 # include <boost/detail/iterator.hpp>
00010 # include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00011 
00012 namespace boost { 
00013 
00014 // Unfortunately, g++ 2.95.x chokes when we define a class template
00015 // iterator_category which has the same name as its
00016 // std::iterator_category() function, probably due in part to the
00017 // "std:: is visible globally" hack it uses.  Use
00018 // BOOST_ITERATOR_CATEGORY to write code that's portable to older
00019 // GCCs.
00020 
00021 # if BOOST_WORKAROUND(__GNUC__, <= 2)
00022 #  define BOOST_ITERATOR_CATEGORY iterator_category_
00023 # else
00024 #  define BOOST_ITERATOR_CATEGORY iterator_category
00025 # endif
00026 
00027 
00028 template <class Iterator>
00029 struct iterator_value
00030 {
00031     typedef typename detail::iterator_traits<Iterator>::value_type type;
00032 };
00033   
00034 template <class Iterator>
00035 struct iterator_reference
00036 {
00037     typedef typename detail::iterator_traits<Iterator>::reference type;
00038 };
00039   
00040   
00041 template <class Iterator>
00042 struct iterator_pointer
00043 {
00044     typedef typename detail::iterator_traits<Iterator>::pointer type;
00045 };
00046   
00047 template <class Iterator>
00048 struct iterator_difference
00049 {
00050     typedef typename detail::iterator_traits<Iterator>::difference_type type;
00051 };
00052 
00053 template <class Iterator>
00054 struct BOOST_ITERATOR_CATEGORY
00055 {
00056     typedef typename detail::iterator_traits<Iterator>::iterator_category type;
00057 };
00058 
00059 # if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1200)
00060 template <>
00061 struct iterator_value<int>
00062 {
00063     typedef void type;
00064 };
00065   
00066 template <>
00067 struct iterator_reference<int>
00068 {
00069     typedef void type;
00070 };
00071 
00072 template <>
00073 struct iterator_pointer<int>
00074 {
00075     typedef void type;
00076 };
00077   
00078 template <>
00079 struct iterator_difference<int>
00080 {
00081     typedef void type;
00082 };
00083   
00084 template <>
00085 struct BOOST_ITERATOR_CATEGORY<int>
00086 {
00087     typedef void type;
00088 };
00089 # endif
00090 
00091 } // namespace boost::iterator
00092 
00093 #endif // ITERATOR_TRAITS_DWA200347_HPP
